price: Glavešine naroda faraonova povikaše: "Ovaj je, doista, čarobnjak koji zna,
arabic: قَالَ ٱلۡمَلَأُ مِن قَوۡمِ فِرۡعَوۡنَ إِنَّ هَٰذَا لَسَٰحِرٌ عَلِيمٞ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qāla al-mala-u min qawmi fir'ʿawna inna hādhā lasāḥirun ʿalīmun
